choose.when: where (member_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or member_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or member_nickname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) and member_admin = 0

mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, member_nickname, member_gender, member_phone, to_char(member_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') member_birth, no from (select row_number() over(order by member_id) no, m.* from member m ) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList} order by no desc
select member_id, member_name, member_nickname, member_gender, member_phone, to_char(member_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') member_birth, member_profileimg, member_phone_id from member where member_id = #{id}
